bio: Adam is a Senior Sales Engineer at MarkLogic, in UK Public Sector team, focusing on central Government, Defence and Intelligence prospects. He is a keen blogger on technology issues with over 1200 visitors per month to his Big Data blog.  In his spare time he is a Flight Sergeant with 1401 (Alfreton & Ripley) Squadron Air Training Corps (ATC), the youth organisation of the Royal Air Force.
name: Adam Fowler
